OEM Unlock


In later versions of android an extra layer of protection was enabled to stop the bootloader being unlocked directly via fastboot, to enable unlocking follow these steps:

  1. Boot the device as normal and skip through all startup menus
  2. Open Settings
  3. Open About phone
  4. Tap on the Build Number field 7 times to enable developer mode
  5. Return to the settings menu and open the Development Options
  6. Enable the OEM Unlock field
  7. You can now boot into fastboot or whichever mode is required by your device to unlock the bootloader
